# motivation
```{r}
hist(runif(1000))
```

```{r}
mns = NULL
for (i in 1 : 1000) mns = c(mns, mean(runif(40)))
hist(mns)
```

```{r}
hist(rexp(n=1000,rate=0.2))
```

```{r}
exp_means = NULL
for (i in 1 : 1000) exp_means = c(exp_means, mean(rexp(n=40,rate=0.2)))
hist(exp_means)
```

The mean, variance and stardard deviation of the exponential means distribution.

```{r}
mean(exp_means)
var(exp_means)
sd(exp_means)
```
